traits.name: Dragon Fanatic
entries: The dragonfang has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}. While the dragonfang can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonfang ignores the effects of being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

traits.name: Fanatic Advantage
entries: Once per turn, if the dragonfang makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, the target takes an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage.

traits.name: Limited Flight
entries: The dragonfang can use a bonus action to gain a flying speed of 30 feet until the end of its turn.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The dragonfang has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonfang's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The Dragonfang attacks twice with its shortsword.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage of the type to which the dragonfang has resistance.

actions.name: Orb of Dragon's Breath (2/Day)
entries: Ranged Spell atk +5 to hit, range 50 ft., one target. 22 ({@dice 5d8}) damage of the type to which the dragonfang has damage resistance.
